# Get source:
git clone https://github.com/erikd/libsndfile
git checkout 1.0.28

# Compile
cd libsndfile
sudo apt install autoconf autogen automake build-essential libasound2-dev libflac-dev libogg-dev libtool libvorbis-dev pkg-config python
./autogen.sh
./configure
make -j6
make check

# STATIC LIB WILL BE IN:
# ./src/.libs/libsndfile.a
